page.title: 20BEAUPRE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {BEAUPRE COMMUNITY PRIMARY SCHOOL} room where organisations can hold their meetings. Children begin their formal schooling at Beaupre in the academic year in which their fifth birthday falls. In the Infant Reception Class there is a full-time Nursery Assistant. There are three other classes in the school and the children move on to their local Secondary schools when they are eleven years of age. Beaupre has an excellent reputation in the area; the children receive a sound education from a dedicated, hard-working staff. The close community links have undoubtedly enhanced the school's reputation.
